Mulcusacon.  That wasn't so hard.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> (OOC)
> Kyle you know that's BS. The problem here is using a name that was 
in use
> already. For example what if someone wanted the name "Black Zardus" 
(ripping
> the japanese way of making sequel characters)... people would 
confuse this
> new character with having some relation to "Future Zardus" and the 
original
> "Zardus" who were owned by one of the council members.
> 
>  Hence to stop this confusion it's easier for a new player to just 
select a
> different name. The problem arises however that there has been so 
many bots
> on Earth (both currently in use and on the deceased/missing list) 
that it's
> near impossible to generate an original "transformer" name.
> 
>
